name: Nice Cat Story
description:
Hello. This is a nice game about a nice cat. The cat wants to get an apple from the top of a tree. It must climb to the top. On the way it may encounter - spikes, goo monsters, floating household appliances, enemy cats, existential crisis, great joy.

It's a five minute game made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2017. The controls aren't perfect but I think it's pretty okay for what it is.

Thanks!
